OpenReadMe.label: Open README.txt
OpenReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script

CommandName.label: Command Name
CommandName.tooltip: How users will call the command.

Response.label: Message
Response.tooltip: The message sent when a user calls the command. Args: {channel_name} {time_played} {game_name}

TimeUnit.label: Time Unit
TimeUnit.tooltip: Units of time to display playtime.

Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: Minimum seconds before the command can be called again.

GameName.label: Game Name
GameName.tooltip: The name of the game being played.

GameID.label: Game ID
GameID.tooltip: The game ID as determined by Steam.

SteamAPIKey.label: Steam API Key
SteamAPIKey.tooltip: Your personal Steam API Key. DO NOT SHARE WITH ANYONE
